title: I'm a full stack developer based in Europe.
description: Hi, I'm Johnny Aguilera! Nice to meet you. In this section, you will get to know a bit more about me.
description2: Throughout my career, I have worked extensively on both the front-end and back-end aspects of web projects. I have experience building applications from scratch as well as migrating legacy projects to more modern, high-performance versions using the latest technologies. I am passionate about continuous learning and strive to expand my knowledge every day. The rapid evolution of web and software engineering is what makes it so exciting, and I enjoy the challenge of staying up to date with new advancements in the field.
